name: Pathos TD
description:
HTML Version has know UI Bug, range of towers is a purple sphere. Visuals are much better on Windows version. Highly recommend downloading game.

Viktor is performing his first pathogen defence operation. Help him succeed!

Pathos TD is a tower defense game where you kill pathogens inside a patient's body using microbots. Place towers in strategic locations to best spend your genetic material (currency).

Enemies include Virus, Bacteria, Protozoon, Fungus, Worm and Composite. Using the approriate tower deals 200% damage. The wrong one deals 50% damage.

When an arrow points towards something it deals 200% damage, the opposite direction deals 50%.

Virus -> Bacteria -> Worm -> Protozoon -> Fungus -> Virus

Windows version is recommended for better graphics, but web also works.

Created for Score Space Jam.

Yughues Free Metal Materials, UCLA Wireframe Shader and Orbit (Free Ambient Video Game Music)  were downloaded from the Unity Store

A few utility functions where also written before hand.

Thanks to Pawel Czerwinski for their image:

https://unsplash.com/photos/wZHDa7cD7Ps
